t:
Everybody is busy, Everybody is rushing,
Everybody is working and pushing.
Everybody is chasing, Everybody is competing,
Everybody is striving and beating.

Everybody is running, Everybody is racing,
Everybody is hurrying and pacing.
Everybody wants more, Everybody wants better,
Everybody wants faster and smarter.
c:
But Nobody is happy, Nobody is satisfied,
Nobody is content and gratified.
Nobody is caring, Nobody is loving,
Nobody is sharing and giving.
Nobody is helping, Nobody is supporting,
Nobody is listening and comforting.
Nobody has time, Nobody has space,
Nobody has peace and grace.

So, what’s the point of this rat race?
What’s the meaning of this chase?
Is it worth it to lose your face?
Is it worth it to lose your place?

Maybe Somebody should slow down,
Maybe Somebody should look around.
Maybe Somebody should stop and think,
Maybe Somebody should connect and link.

Maybe then Everybody would find,
Maybe then Everybody would mind.
Maybe then Everybody would see,
Maybe then Everybody would be.



Somebody. Everybody. Nobody is left behind.


#ratrace #lifegoals #happiness #mindfulness #compassion #humanity #innerpeace #slowdown
